titles.title: Entitled, "The North American Border Stations Improvements Act".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Public Works + Transportation.

committee.name: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Public Buildings and Grounds.

bill.summary: 8/2/1994--Introduced. Authorizes the Administrator of the General Services Administration to enter into agreements with State and local governments or private U.S. corporations for the construction of border stations on the borders of the United States with Canada and Mexico. Sets forth agreement requirements and terms.
